If I install the software, will I definitely get a virus or malware on my computer?

No, installing the software will not necessarily result in a virus or malware infection. Some antivirus software, such as Avast and Kaspersky, may flag the software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP" (Potentially Unwanted Program), but this is because the software is a mining software, not because it contains malware.
